tag_list: tinnerello, saas, mobius, document-management, evapt, vp
overview:
Tinnerello is a seasoned executive and accomplished entrepreneur with 25+ years experience accelerating growth for established enterprises, launching new startups and transforming struggling ventures into viable operations. History of creating and executing plans that achieve record results. Reputation for attracting high profile investors, board members and strategic partners. Skilled at dealing with complex market strategy scenarios and delivering on aggressive product development timelines. Track record of building highly motivated sales teams that create lasting customer relationships and deliver bottom line performance. 16+ years board-level and senior management.

He’s lived outside the US in: Amsterdam, Manila, Singapore and Sydney and spent many years traveling around the world. He’s as comfortable living and working in cultures outside of the United States as he is with-in our borders.

Specialties: Executive management, startup and turnaround, equity financing, complex market strategy scenarios, aggressive product development, bottom line performance.
